promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a young strong dragon fire-type pokemon holding a fiery bow. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or dragon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyrobendix, a a young strong dragon fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Flare Tail, Lava Burn. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragon", "fire" or "Pyrobendix". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, dragon-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: Born amidst desert storms, Pyrobendix masters both sand and flame. Its Flare Tail dazzles at dusk, while Lava Burn turns dunes to glass.
